backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Track all my important meetings and flag any that require focus time to prepare for them.

gutts.name: Calendar Data Retrieval
gutts.capability: Load and parse calendar events from data source for analysis
gutts.user_goal: Get comprehensive calendar data for analysis
gutts.evidence: Calendar API query loaded 267 events from my_calendar_events_complete_attendees.json

gutts.name: Meeting Importance Classification
gutts.capability: Score meetings based on multiple importance criteria (executives, customers, large meetings, presentations)
gutts.user_goal: Identify which meetings are important and require attention
gutts.evidence: Implemented importance scoring with 9 factors: executive_attendee (25pts), external_attendee (20pts), large_meeting (15pts), etc.

gutts.name: Preparation Time Estimation
gutts.capability: Calculate required preparation time based on meeting type, importance, and complexity
gutts.user_goal: Know how much time to allocate for meeting preparation
gutts.evidence: Created prep time mapping for 10+ meeting types: Executive Briefing (120min), Customer Meeting (90min), Technical Design Review (60min), etc.

gutts.name: Meeting Flagging Logic
gutts.capability: Identify and flag meetings that need preparation focus time based on importance and prep requirements
gutts.user_goal: Get clear list of meetings requiring prep time allocation
gutts.evidence: Flagging logic: importance_score >= 30 AND prep_time > 0 (identified 8 meetings requiring prep)

gutts.name: Calendar Gap Analysis
gutts.capability: Identify available time slots in calendar for scheduling focus time blocks
gutts.user_goal: Find when focus time can be scheduled without conflicts
gutts.evidence: Gap finding algorithm analyzes calendar: before first meeting, between meetings, after last meeting

gutts.name: Focus Time Block Scheduling
gutts.capability: Create and schedule preparation time blocks in calendar with appropriate timing
gutts.user_goal: Automatically block time for meeting preparation
gutts.evidence: Scheduled 6 focus time blocks with .ics export: meeting_prep_focus_time.ics

gutts.name: Actionable Recommendations & Reporting
gutts.capability: Generate user-facing insights, summaries, and preparation guidance
gutts.user_goal: Understand which meetings need prep and receive specific guidance
gutts.evidence: Generated daily digest with prep alerts, schedule overview, specific recommendations: 'Executive Briefing on Oct 15 - 2 hours prep recommended'

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 7 GUTTs. Implemented solution: track_important_meetings.py, schedule_focus_time.py, daily_meeting_digest.py
